category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Enable_Bulk_Reservation
preference.preference_description: This preference allows improving performance of reservation actions on multiple objcts. This preference is applicable only to the System Engineering application's Requirement View. Valid Values: * true: The objects checked out will not have the backup copy. The backup copy of the object is created only when the given reserved object is modified. * false: This is the default value. This will use the regular reservation operations.
